mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (md_id, member_id, member_nick, review_title, review_content, review_date, review_star) VALUES(#{md_id}, #{member_id}, #{member_nick}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, now(), #{review_star})
mapper.select: select review_id, md_id, member_id, member_nick, order_detail_id, review_title , review_content, review_date, review_viewcnt, review_star from review where md_id = #{md_id} and review_enable = "Y" order by review_id desc limit #{limitNum}, 10
select count(review_id) cnt from review where md_id = #{md_id} and review_enable = "Y"
